name: SCNLookAtConstraint
desc: A constraint that orients a node to always point toward a specified other node.

items.name: init(target: SCNNode?)
items.desc: Creates a look-at constraint for a specified target node.

items.name: var isGimbalLockEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether constrained nodes are allowed to rotate.

items.name: var target: SCNNode?
items.desc: The node toward which constrained nodes will point after being reoriented.
